Title: Access approval definition
Description: Clear definition of subject-related attributes for granting access (e.g., user affiliation, validated ethics approval). AAAI must support authorization based on subject attributes, and should define a "standard" set of those. It cannot dictate one solution for all, as stated in MS8, due to driver- or nation-specific requirements.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Project Access Request Form , A form capturing at least the user's name, project ID, required tools, and justification for access.
Access Control Policy. The governing document defining the criteria for approval
Project Role-Based Access (RBAC) Definition. A document defining standard "Research Personas" (e.g., Analyst vs. Principal Investigator) and their pre-approved permission levels.
Authorization Record, a formal timestamped record from a ticketing service (e.g., Jira/ServiceNow) showing the approval from the responsible person.
